availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wiley Plummer Griffey (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Vilander Caldwell Luten Griffey in Fulton County, Kentucky, on December 17, 1857. Father of Luten Griffey and Ida Griffey. Farmer in Moscow, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Moscow in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 452.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 1.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fulton County Marriages, Film #000321403, p. 344.
Find A Grave, "Wiley Plummer Griffey (1831-1876)," Memorial #78302041, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/78302041 (accessed July 7, 2020).
